name: A Mozilla-Zine Sidebar Show/Hide
description:
Based on style 146 by user 12 and style 44800 by user 61655 to work with style 62326

1440x900 resolution (adjustments may be needed for the position:absolute arguments on other resolutions - see the code)
additional_info:
Updated to show only a vertical bar (as opposed to a horizontal bar that goes all the way down the page) to the right, from where the side bar will drop down.
Reduces hover instances wherein the side bar appears when not intentionally desiring such.
Also, the sidebar will drop directly below the vertical bar with no page rearrangement when combined with style 62326.
